snippet.title: Balatro: Friends of Jimbo (Pack 4) - Official Reveal Trailer | ID@Xbox
snippet.description:
Watch the latest Balatro trailer to see the new collaborations in the Pack 4 update, including Bugsnax, Assassin's Creed, Slay the Princess, Fallout, and more. The Balatro: Friends of Jimbo Update 4 is now available on PC, consoles, and mobile. 

Balatro is also out today on Xbox, Xbox Game Pass, and Windows PC.

#IGN #Gaming
